name: Sewn 'Venture
description: Thread Boy has found himself in a house infested with hostile creatures. Only you can help him overcome the odds and stop the instigators in the house you find yourself in. Sew, place, unsew, and rotate your way to new paths as a tiny thread creature making your way from room to room. What stands in your way are ferocious and unexpected enemies and an unrelentingly scarce environment. Can you rise to the occasion as Thread Boy and collect thread to sew your way across the room or will you unravel under the pressure?
